trans-unit.source: A tram (also known as tramcar; and in North America known as streetcar, trolley or trolley car) is a rail vehicle which runs on tracks along public urban streets, and also sometimes on a segregated right of way.
trans-unit.target: Električky disponujú oveľa väčšou prepravnou kapacitou ako autobusy či trolejbusy. Pohyb po koľajniciach umožňuje rýchlu a plynulú prepravu cestujúcich alebo nákladu v mestách a ich okolí.

trans-unit.source: A tram (also known as tramcar; and in North America known as streetcar, trolley or trolley car) is a rail vehicle which runs on tracks along public urban streets, and also sometimes on a segregated right of way.
trans-unit.target: Električka je koľajový dopravný prostriedok (jednoduchší a ľahší ako vlak) prevádzkovaný v mestskej a prímestskej hromadnej doprave.
